    • About Daniel Dixon


    Daniel Dixon is the Owner/CEO of The Dixon Group in Denver, Colorado. Over the past 8 years Daniel has grown his company from being a Single Agent to running a Mega Agent Team with an incredible group of 32 Agent partners in 3 Expansion Locations. Over the past 8 years, Daniel and his team has helped more than 1200 families with over $400 Million in home sales. The Dixon Group is ranked as the #1 Real Estate Team in Denver and top 50 KW teams in the United States. After achieving high levels of success in the real estate industry, Daniel has focused his attention on vertical integration, having started a Mortgage Company, a Title Company, an Investment Business and launching 2 foundations aimed at helping the Black Community. Daniel’s journey has been full of challenges and failures, but like he always says - We’re going to the moon - The Best is Ahead!

    Daniel Dixon
    The Dixon Group
